mapper.select: SELECT TRADE_ID, COIN_ID, SELL_ID, BUY_ID, QUANTITY, UNIT_PRICE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM TRADE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT COIN_ID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS TRADE_VOLUME, MIN(UNIT_PRICE) AS LOWEST_PRICE, MAX(UNIT_PRICE) AS HIGHEST_PRICE FROM TRADE WHERE DATE(CREATED_AT) = DATE(NOW()) GROUP BY COIN_ID;
